oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Memories of District C, Civilian Conservation Corps, 1934
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Memories of District C, Civilian Conservation Corps, 1934. Histories, rosters, and photographs of Tennessee companies. Gift of Victor Wihera Company 1262, TVA Camp 17, Arthur, Tennessee).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Civilian Conservation Corps (C.C.C., CCC); Scrapbooks;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Company 223, New Tazewell, Tenn. -- Company 224, Maynardville, Tenn. -- Company 252, LaFollette, Tenn. -- Company 254, New Tazewell, Tenn. -- Company 263, LaFollette, Tenn. -- Company 267, Speedwell, Tenn. -- Company 284, Coal Creek, Tenn. -- Company 292, Coal Creek, Tenn. -- Company 294, Agee, Tenn. -- Company 297, Loyston, Tenn. -- Company 1208, Loyston, Tenn. -- Company 1222, Sharp's Chapel, Tenn. -- Company 1248, LaFollette, Tenn. -- Company 1257, New Tazewell, Tenn. -- Company 1262, Arthur, Tenn. -- Company 1223, LaFollette, Tenn.
